- Friends and Family
- Manual and auto login
- Activating VAS Offer
- History of each financial/non-financial operation action
- Subscribers can use this application with USSD version which enables them to use all features without using WIFI or GPRS connection

· Dynamic Combo: Live life your way! Can’t find a bundle of your choice? This new feature provides you the freedom to customize your Data, Voice Minutes and SMS Plan to fit your lifestyle. Try it.
· Increase Credit Limit: Exceeding your Credit Limit on your PostPaid Subscription? Use this feature to request an increase on your Credit Limit.
· Damage Voucher Recharge: Having troubles with a damaged or over-scratched recharge voucher? Don’t stress; a new function added to rescue. Use this feature to enter details of unused damaged recharge voucher to complete your recharge or bill payment.

· Dynamic Combo: Live life your way! Can’t find a bundle of your choice? This new feature provides you the freedom to customize your Data, Voice Minutes and SMS Plan to fit your lifestyle. Try it.
· Increase Credit Limit: Exceeding your Credit Limit on your PostPaid Subscription? Use this feature to request an increase on your Credit Limit.
· Damage Voucher Recharge: Having troubles with a damaged or over-scratched recharge voucher? Don’t stress; a new function added to rescue. Use this feature to enter details of unused damaged recharge voucher to complete your recharge or bill payment.

· Dynamic Combo: Live life your way! Can’t find a bundle of your choice? This new feature provides you the freedom to customize your Data, Voice Minutes and SMS Plan to fit your lifestyle. Try it.
· Increase Credit Limit: Exceeding your Credit Limit on your PostPaid Subscription? Use this feature to request an increase on your Credit Limit.
· Damage Voucher Recharge: Having troubles with a damaged or over-scratched recharge voucher? Don’t stress; a new function added to rescue. Use this feature to enter details of unused damaged recharge voucher to complete your recharge or bill payment.

1)   Recharge a friend: A friend or family member ran out of credit? No worries! You can now rescue them with this new feature to Top-up their account via your Bank card. Voila.
2)  Bolton usage details: With this feature update, see more detailed usage of each purchased Bolton separately. Never miss a beat. Control like you never had before.
3)  Registration for new subscribers: Are you a new subscriber and don’t have a MyIrancell account? We provide you an easier and hassle free registration process and password generation. Try this and continue to be amazed!
4)  Unlock user: Has your account been locked and not able to login?? Chill!! Use this feature to Unlock your account. No more calling the Customer Care to Unlock your account. We hear you; thanks for suggesting this feature.
5)  Rate the app: Your feedback is valuable to us; it helps us to identify the areas we need to focus, improve, correct and innovate. But most importantly it tells us what information or feature you want to see.

1) Buyable offers balance: Subscribers can now view the balance of their purchased buyable offers.
2) Performance optimization: With this update enjoy better user experience and faster app performance.
3) Push alerts: We heard your feedbacks. Notifications come to MyIrancell App. Never miss a beat! Stay updated with the new Irancell offers and promotions.
4) Easy P2P transfers: Make P2P money transfer from the App without dialing USSD shortcodes.
